trends: There have been 136 other sightings in Toronto
There were no other sightings in Toronto on or around May 11th 2009
Summary: Looked like a big bird at beginning, but than it started changing directions very fast
divs: Sighting DetailsMy brother and I smoking cigarets on my balcony, I live on 19 floor over looking downtown Toronto and Ontario Lake. So we smoking and talking looking twords downtown, my brother tells me look at this big bird, it was coming from south to north, from downtown twords us, We are looking at this thing, it was kind of far but we could still see it , and then it started acting wiarde, changing directions very fast, we are like what a hell, than it started going up, my bro told me to grab camer. I went inside took my camera, came out on balcony but I couldn't see it no more. I turned my Digi and zoomed in to max and lucky me I found this object in my camera screen, and took three or four pics.
